name: monitor
title: Infrastructure Monitor
description: Read-only infrastructure monitoring via Thanos. Queries Prometheus metrics for pod status, deployments, and resource usage.
setup_instructions: Requires network access to Thanos endpoint (e.g., via VPN). No authentication needed if network-level access is available.

install.linux: sudo apt-get install -y jq || sudo yum install -y jq
